queries.sql: INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Based on historic experience with the client and the client\\’s expertise at budgeting contracts, assess whether their assumption that the outcome of the contract cannot be reliably assessed is reasonable. <b>(V)</b></p>\r\n<i>The risk of aggressive earnings or tax management should be carefully considered</i>', '', '<p>Check client maintains adequate inventory records that are kept up to date.</p>', '', '2.4.4 E2-3', '2.4.4 E2-3', '21', 'Active', '2024-04-10 12:12:43')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Check inventory records are supported by purchase invoices, production records and labour analysis for transfers in and sales invoices / goods outward notes for transfers out.</p>\r\n', '', '', '', '2.4.4 E2-3', '2.4.4 E2-3', '21', 'Active', '2024-04-10 12:12:43')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Review sequence of pre-numbered dispatch and receipts documents.</p>', '', '', '', '2.4.4 E2-3', '2.4.4 E2-3', '21', 'Active', '2024-04-10 12:12:43')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Consider reviewing physical inventories at a post period-end date and reconciling back.</p>', '', '', '', '2.4.4 E2-3', '2.4.4 E2-3', '21', 'Active', '2024-04-10 12:12:43')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Check whether inventories are counted once a year, and consider attending interim inventory count. Review records of the inventory count to see if necessary adjustments have been put through.</p>\r\n', '', '', '', '2.4.4 E2-3', '2.4.4 E2-3', '21', 'Active', '2024-04-10 12:12:43')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Verify reconciling and adjusting entries between physical and book inventories at the inventory count date.</p>', '', '', '', '2.4.4 E2-3', '2.4.4 E2-3', '21', 'Active', '2024-04-10 12:12:43')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>Check book inventories have been updated for purchases and sales prior to the period end, and omit subsequent movements.</p>', '', '', '', '2.4.4 E2-3', '2.4.4 E2-3', '21', 'Active', '2024-04-10 12:12:43')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c2` (`question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `type`, `code`, `c2tID`, `status`, `updated_on`) VALUES ('<p>List and perform any additional tests considered necessary.</p>', '', '', '', '2.4.4 E2-3', '2.4.4 E2-3', '21', 'Active', '2024-04-10 12:12:43')

post.question:
Array
(
    [0] => <p>Based on historic experience with the client and the client\’s expertise at budgeting contracts, assess whether their assumption that the outcome of the contract cannot be reliably assessed is reasonable.  <b>(V)</b></p>
<i>The risk of aggressive earnings or tax management should be carefully considered</i>
    [1] => <p>Check inventory records are supported by purchase invoices, production records and labour analysis for transfers in and sales invoices / goods outward notes for transfers out.</p>

    [2] => <p>Review sequence of pre-numbered dispatch and receipts documents.</p>
    [3] => <p>Consider reviewing physical inventories at a post period-end date and reconciling back.</p>
    [4] => <p>Check whether inventories are counted once a year, and consider attending interim inventory count.  Review records of the inventory count to see if necessary adjustments have been put through.</p>

    [5] => <p>Verify reconciling and adjusting entries between physical and book inventories at the inventory count date.</p>
    [6] => <p>Check book inventories have been updated for purchases and sales prior to the period end, and omit subsequent movements.</p>
    [7] => <p>List and perform any additional tests considered necessary.</p>
)
